column2: List of Phrases
"Open the door!"
column5:
If a door knocking type has multiple phrases, simply append a new row.
So far all people who are knocking outside (except the Dog) are considered as "Knock_random"

column2: "Delivery! Open the door!"
"Don't you want your food?"
"Anyone home?"
column5: If a door knocking type has no phrases, simply leave it blank

column2: "What a shitty day! Some guy jumped out and stole a few deliveries. Luckily yours is fine. Now open up, would you? I got a long way to go.
"Delivery!"
